text: tama kriyavanhi napura tamanta alamkara karanu læba eya ohu yahapatak lesa dakinna (allah maga pen vu ayaku men ve)da? eheyin allah taman abhimata karana aya nomaga hariyi. tavada ohu abhimata karana ayata maga penvayi. eheyin ovun gæna oba dukata pat karaganimin obe atmaya pahakara noyavanu. niyata vasayenma allah ovun sidukarana dæ pilibanda va sarva gnaniya
